main event: A pilot on a PAL flight reported seeing a metallic missile-like object hovering in the sky over Bohol Island, leaving a smoke trail behind. The object seemed to be elliptical in shape and was in view for about 90 seconds.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 60 seconds, providing a relatively extended observation period for the UFO.
The pilot estimated the altitude of the object to be approximately 15,000 feet or less.
Local investigation failed to disclose any missing aircraft or known balloons or equipment that might have been the source of the sighting.
The sighting report was sent to both CAA and the US Bureau, neither of whom had information about the unidentified object.
The sighting report was also intended for the information of the USAF, indicating the potential military interest in the UFO sighting.
sighted object: Metallic missile-like object hovering in the sky
